thread.title: KKK fliers singled out Black residents in Mobile on Martin Luther King Jr. holiday
thread.title_full: KKK fliers singled out Black residents in Mobile on Martin Luther King Jr. holiday

author: Prescotte Stokes III | pstokes@al.com
title: KKK fliers singled out Black residents in Mobile on Martin Luther King Jr. holiday
text: After returning home from celebrating Martin Luther King Jr. Day festivities earlier in the day 28-year-old Tiffany Johnson, stood in disbelief in the driveway of her home on Panorama Drive.A small flier, inside of a plastic bag ziploc bag with sand inside with Dr. King's image on it was filled with what she dubbed, racist remarks."I have small kids," said Johnson "you don't know if it's someone in the neighborhood it could be your neighbor or someone just passing by."
